name: Portas Inferi: Star Fort Defense
description:
Inspired by the  Holgersson Entertainment game Fortify. Still heavily in development. Expect updates over the next several days.

Summary

Take control of a fortress town in the world of Foringaor, where an ancient evil wakes. Defend your town against waves of enemies from all directions, using what limited resources you can gather from throughout the town. How long can you hold them back?

How to play

Before a wave of enemies arrives, you will be alerted to what direction they are coming from. Prepare for their arrival by moving your units into position along the fort's walls.
